Verses: 1 karththar En Velichchamum En Iratchippumaanavar, Yaarukkup Payappatuven? Karththar En Jeevanin Pelanaanavar, Yaarukku Anjuven?
2 en Saththurukkalum En Pagaignarumaagiya Pollaadhavargal En Maamsaththaip Patchikka, Ennai Nerukkugaiyil Avargale Idarivizhundhaargal.
3 enakku Virodhamaaga Oru Paalayamiranginaalum, En Irudhayam Bayappadaadhu; Enmel Yuththam Ezhumbinaalum, Idhile Naan Nambikkaiyaayiruppen.

4 karththaridaththil Ondrai Naan Ketten, Adhaiye Naaduven; Naan Karththarudaiya Magimaiyaip Paarkkumbadiyaagavum, Avarudaiya Aalayaththil Aaraaichsiseyyumbadiyaagavum, Naan En Jeevanulla Naalellaam Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Thangiyiruppadhaiye Naaduven.
5 theengunaalil Avar Ennaith Thammudaiya Koodaaraththil Maraiththu, Ennaith Thamadhu Koodaara Maraivile Oliththuvaiththu, Ennaik Kanmalaiyinmel Uyarththuvaar.

6 ippozhudhu En Thalai Ennaich Sutrilum Irukkira En Saththurukkalukku Melaaga Uyarththappadum; Adhinimiththam Avarudaiya Koodaaraththile Naan Aanandha Balikalaiyittu, Karththaraip Paadi, Avaraik Keerththanampannuven.
7 karththaave, Naan Kooppidugira Saththaththai Neer Kettu, Enakku Irangi, Enakku Uththaravu Arulichcheyyum.
8 en Mukaththaith Thedungal Endru Sonneere, Ummudaiya Mugaththaiye Theduven Karththaave, Endru En Irudhayam Ummidaththil Sollitru.
9 umadhu Mugaththai Enakku Maraiyaadheyum; Neer Kobaththudan Umadhu Adiyenai Vilakkippodaadheyum; Neere Enakkuch Sagaayar; En Ratchippin Dhevane, Ennai Negizhavidaamalum Ennaik Kaividaamalum Irum.
10 en Thagappanum En Thaayum Ennaik Kaivittaalum, Karththar Ennaich Serththukkolluvaar.
11 karththaave, Umadhu Vazhiyai Enakkup Podhiththu, En Edhiraaligalinimiththam Sevvaiyaana Paadhaiyil Ennai Nadaththum.
12 en Saththurukkalin Ishtaththukku Ennai Oppukkodaadheyum; Poichsaatchigalum Aakkiramiththuch Seerugiravargalum Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbiyirukkiraargal.
13 naano, Jeevanullor Dhesaththile Karththarudaiya Nanmaiyaik Kaanben Endru Visuvaasiyaadhirundhaal Kettuppoyiruppen.
14 karththarukkuk Kaaththiru; Avar Un Irudhayaththai Sthirappaduththuvaar; Thidamanadhaayirundhu, Karththarukke Kaaththiru.
